name: Komperdell Ti-7 EXP Compact Powerlock Poles - Unisex
description: Boulder fields, gnarly scree descents or holding up a tarp shelter in a windstorm, these durable poles are up for the challenge.3-section design with durable 7075-T6 aluminum.Compact features: smaller grip and shorter pole length.Powerlock 3.0 for secure adjustments.Ultralight foam grips.Padded wrist straps.Includes trekking baskets.Durable carbide tips.
